CustomField.formula: IF( Deal_Estimated_Margin__c >= 0.25, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_" + "5" + "00.gif", "Rating Level" ), IF( Deal_Estimated_Margin__c >= 0.23, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_" + "4" + "00.gif", "Rating Level" ), IF( Deal_Estimated_Margin__c >= 0.20, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_" + "3" + "00.gif", "Rating Level" ), IF( Deal_Estimated_Margin__c >= 0.16, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_" + "2" + "00.gif", "Rating Level" ), IF( Deal_Estimated_Margin__c > 0.11, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_" + "1" + "00.gif", "Rating Level" ), IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_" + "0" + "00.gif", "Rating Level" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This shows the deal star rating based on a scale of 1 (low) - 5 (excellent). This is calculated on the estimated deal margin percentage. 5 stars is >= 25% 4 stars is 23%-24% 3 stars is 20-22%-2 2 stars is 16%-19% 1 star is 11%-15% 0 stars is 0%-10%
CustomField.label: Deal Rating Stars
